name: places/ChIJV3rGZJxZwokRcbtEEWI7Edk
formattedAddress: 33 St Marks Pl, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 33 St Marks Pl, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text:
Unreal. I have never had a computer service experience as good as this. I called and explained that my MacBookPro's monitor had ceased working but that when I hooked the computer up to a projector it still functioned. They estimated the monitor needed replacing and quoted a price. I brought it in an hour or so later. 3 hours later, they called and said the repair was complete — they had had the replacement part in stock. They charged the quoted price. My machine looks like new and is working well so far -- and they said the repair is warrantied for 6 months.

I've had other places take forever, not have the part, not know what to do, and charge more than they estimated, or charge a ludicrous amount to diagnose a problem they can't then fix ("looks like you need to replace the machine!"). In Manhattan, in Arizona, in Maine. I expected to be told today that my machine was totaled. But no. It's just fixed.

I'm know still flushed with with the warm glow of satisfied amazement. But today, I can't recommend this shop highly enough. Thank you for your help!

originalText.text: Great experience! I needed two Macbooks fixed and I was able to pick them up the next day. Really appreciated the quick turnaround time, advice, and professionalism. Honest work and they offer a 6 month warranty on their fixes!

text.text: Great experience! I needed two Macbooks fixed and I was able to pick them up the next day. Really appreciated the quick turnaround time, advice, and professionalism. Honest work and they offer a 6 month warranty on their fixes!

originalText.text: this is the real deal. honest, fair, quick service. my partner has had many good experiences with them, and I came in just to have a single key on my macbook repaired (which I messed up trying to fix myself). after just 10-15 minutes of tinkering, Tony fixed the problem and gave me a great deal fit for the holidays. kind and professional service all the way. highly recommend

originalText.text:
My iPhone was filled with water damage at a water park. I came to these guys and was really praying that they’d be able to extract my data even tho my phone was dead…I know, long shot. But guess what, they were able to get it done!!! I went to other shops who basically said it’s a no go or someone said they will try and can’t assure me but I have to mail the phone out to them and etc.

— This is a super late review, this all happened when I had the iPhone 7 Plus (the year it was released). I’m writing the review now because I’m referring a friend here. Great experience, great staff and very good pricing. I also got my MacBook keys replaced from here when we had the neighbors kid come over and rip them out of my MacBook! (2011 MacBook Pro that lasted me 10 years)

originalText.text: quick, fast, informative and easy repair for my phone screen. walked in and took less than 20 minutes. there was external and internal damage yet the cost was still such great value for what i came in with. shout out to tony for helping me out!
